text: Yā pana bhikkhunī paṭicchanne okāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī paṭicchanne okāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 12. Should any bhikkhunī stand or converse with a man, one on one, in a concealed place, it is to be confessed.
